thread.title: David Dunham
thread.title_full: Rickshaw Travel (AUS) reviewed by David Dunham

author: David Dunham
title: David Dunham
text: I did an individual tour across India to several areas and each segment went smoothly. The hotels selected were good with a couple a bit special. My driver for a tour in the Western Ghats was very good with a strong knowledge of the areas. Overall very good.
